title: Bloomberg's Condon on Yellen Remarks: More of the Same (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Chris Condon, Bloomberg Fed reporter, for analysis of Janet Yellen's Harvard Club speech.
